metadata.description: Defines allowed, denied, and excepted software licenses for the A.R.C. platform

exceptions.readline: System library, not distributed with application
exceptions.linux-headers: Required for container builds, kernel headers exception applies
exceptions.glibc: System C library, LGPL exception for linking applies
exceptions.musl: System C library for Alpine, permissive terms

policy_notes.viral_licenses: GPL, AGPL, and similar copyleft licenses are denied due to their viral nature requiring derivative works to be open-sourced under the same license.
policy_notes.lgpl_handling: LGPL is conditionally allowed when packages are dynamically linked and not modified, as the linking exception applies.
policy_notes.commercial_restrictions: Licenses with commercial use restrictions (CC-BY-NC, SSPL, Elastic) are denied for commercial deployment.
policy_notes.unknown_handling: Unknown licenses generate warnings but don't block builds. Security team reviews quarterly.
policy_notes.exception_process: To add an exception, create a PR modifying this file with justification in the commit message.
